trans-unit.source: Specifies a label alignment when <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定标签对齐方式时<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: The LabelAlignmentStyles enumeration represents the alignment of a label; it is set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: LabelAlignmentStyles 枚举表示标签; 的对齐方式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the bottom of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的底部对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the bottom-left of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的底部左侧对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the bottom-right of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的底部右侧对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the center of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的中心对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the left of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的左侧对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the right of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的右侧对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the top of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 标签的数据点的顶部对齐。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the top-left corner of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点的左上角对齐标签。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Label is aligned to the top-right corner of the data point.
trans-unit.target: 数据点的右上角对齐标签。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
